content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
-  Ensure that burner entities are properly connected to their respective furnaces or boilers

### Errors when using electricity entities
-  Ensure that electricity entities are properly plugged into the electric network
-  Make sure that the electric network is properly connected to a power source

### Errors when using transport belt system
-  Ensure that the transport belt system is properly connected to the entity that needs to be transported
-  Make sure that the transport belt system is not empty or full

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
No important variables assigned by the agent.
